original: 吳郡富春人，孫堅之妹，後嫁予徐真。正史未見其名，孫茹之名乃後世杜撰。又，東吳名將陸遜之妻，亦有一說名為孫茹，乃孫策之女。
text: Wujun Fuchun, the sister of Sun Jian, later married Xu Zhen. The official history did not see the name, Sun Ru's name was fabricated by later generations. In addition, the wife of Lu Xun, a famous Dongwu general, also said that she was named Sun Ru, who was the daughter of Sun Ce.
